name: The Brothers
description:
A 2d two-player Platformer Game,where you can play as a Vampire and his 'Hero' brother.

Keller'Vamp' Hermann and Joey Hermann are Brothers.Keller Becomes  a vampire and its Joey's job to save the Humans from Keller.

WASD for Keller(Vampire)-P1 who has abilities like double jump,wall jump,transform into a bat.FEED!

Arrow keys for Joey(Hero)-P2,who can use Grapple hook for traversal.SAVE!

The Game is currently in Progress.So we are sorry for the snappy movements , animations and incomplete level .We are beginners and this is our first Game Jam.
